metadata.title: CVE-2020-25651 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the SPICE file transfer protocol. File data from thehost system can end up in full or in parts in the client connection of anillegitimate local user in the VM system. Active file transfers from otherusers could also be interrupted, resulting in a denial of service. Thehighest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality as wellas system availability. This flaw affects spice-vdagent versions 0.20 andprior.

criterions.comment: spice-vdagent: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
